item.title: [SEC-2165] Can not parameterize remember me "token-validity-seconds"
item.description:
A property expression is not resolved for attribute "token-validity-seconds". Other expressions in the very same file are resolved however. The xml file is included into this ticket.

Providing the markup:

<s:remember-me key="optimus-remember-me" use-secure-cookie="true" token-validity-seconds="$

{security.rememberme.ttl}"/>

Will result in the exception:

Caused by: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: cvc-datatype-valid.1.2.1: '${security.rememberme.ttl}

' is not a valid value for 'integer'.
